about_the_game:
A brilliant composer, carpenter, and my dear friend, Artur Samociuk, created this beautiful music for Soulash 2. He's put his heart and soul into creating a distinctive feel for all of the game biomes, from the rhythmically anvil-hitting dwarves in the mountains to the sinister snow wastelands. The adventures would not be as joyful without his input.

By purchasing this soundtrack, you're directly supporting his work.
